title: Stock Futures Gain Ahead of Anticipated Fed Rate Rise
sub_head: Chinese stocks surge after days of losses over Covid-19 lockdowns
body:
U.S. stock futures gained and bond yields rose ahead of an expected interest-rate increase from the Federal Reserve, and technology stocks led a blistering rebound in Chinese markets after supportive comments from Beijing policy makers.
Futures for the S&P 500 rose 1.3% Wednesday, indicating that U.S. stocks will build on Tuesdayâ€™s gains. Contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 advanced 1.8% and futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average added 1.1%.
